Create a 1280x720px banner with advertising content targeted to a persona of a certain age. The design should have a real-life upper body portrait on the right side, taking up the right 2/3 of the banner. The left 1/3 should be blank, with a youtube-style image background that matches the theme. The design should not contain any text., Online English service banner ad character: A 27-year-old Japanese woman with shoulder-length wavy honey-brown hair, light side bangs, bright hazel eyes, and a wide, warm smile. She wears clean, bright business casual or smart casual clothing. She is in a relatable setting like a home, cafe, or office, possibly holding a tablet, laptop, or headset. The image should be bright, positive, and inspiring, embodying confidence and approachability.
